column1: Simple payment solution at low prices.
column2: Simple payment solution at low prices.

You will need to set your API keys before you can accept payments. If you do not yet have a Stancer account, please click here to register.

Learn more about configuring this module from Stancer's official Magento Documentation.

For additional technical support contact magento@stancer.com.

column1:
By using the following tags you can use order data in the payment description:

Order ID: %order%

Amount: %amount%

Store Name: %store%
